ipad.title: Top Free iPad Food & Drink Apps

iphone.title: Top Free iPhone Food & Drink Apps

versionHistory.releaseNotes:
What's new!

-- After the last update, our account creation screen on iPad looked like scrambled eggs. We've done the impossible and unscrambled eggs using magic!

-- Might be winding down, but the fresh fruits and vegetables keep on coming. Find out what's in season near you with our seasonal ingredient finder.

This update contains a number of bug fixes and performance improvements, but over the last five months we've added a ton of features, like:

• A free recipe box that syncs seamlessly between all your apps and Epicurious.com

• A new shopping list, including the ability to add any item, print, or email.

• A seasonal ingredient finder that automatically detects what's in season near you.

• A brand-new design that's more fun, modern, and easier to use.

• A cook mode that uses voice-activated commands.

• Performance improvements that make the app run faster, crash less, and makes your life easier.

Thanks for using the app — and happy cooking.

Get ready to hit the farmer's market with this update! 

• Use your location to find out what vegetables and fruits are in-season near you with our new seasonal ingredient finder.

• Bug fixes and other improvements, like adding our improved shopping list to the home screen.

Shoppers rejoice! Our new app update includes major improvements just for you.

-- Shopping list overhaul. Now you can add individual items that aren't in recipes, email and print shopping lists, all in a newer look and feel.

-- Faster recipe box and shopping list syncing. To improve performance, we rebuilt how both recipe box and shopping list work.

-- Bug fixes and improved stability. Our new update works faster, crashes less, and is far smoother than before.

-- Helpful reminder: To keep your favorites, be sure to sign in with an Epicurious.com account. We'll automatically store your old recipes to the recipe box, so you'll never lose them again.

-- Having problems after upgrading to IOS 7.1? We squashed a nasty little bug related to the update.

-- Continued to improve speed and reduce crashes for users on older devices. 

-- Because of your feedback, we made the ingredients list sticky in the iPad, so you can look at preparation steps and ingredients at the same time.

-- Magically print recipes right from your iPhone or iPad to any wireless printer using AirPrint.
-- E-mail the full recipe text to anyone you want. (Even yourself!) 
-- Speedier than ever -- we've improved load times for folks who are using older devices.
-- We fixed some pesky bugs and made it even easier to create an account to use your recipe box.

-- Never lose your favorites! They're not gone. Just create an account or log in to keep them.

-- Having trouble logging in? We've made it easier for you to create an account, log in, and save the recipes you starred in the old version.

-- Fewer crashes! Voice activated commands will work perfectly the first time around.

-- Where's the beef? It's back! Beef is once again available as a recipe search option. 

-- More design tweaks! Bug fixes! Faster! Better! Stronger!
The award-winning cooking app gets a dramatic update for IOS 7! Free Recipe Box and Shopping List! New Cook Mode for iPad with voice commands! And more!

IMPORTANT: Recipe Box Sync users must install this update in order to continue to sync with your Recipe Box on Epicurious.com

This update contains bug fixes as well as major improvements to Recipe Box Sync, including:
* Faster, smoother updates
* View recipes saved from other websites to your Recipe Box on Epicurious.com
* Sync your personal and member-submitted recipes to your Recipe Box

Fixes bug related to recipe titles not appearing in recipe box

Assorted bug fixes

*Minor bug fixes.
*Optimized assets for Retina display.

*Enhancements and minor bug fixes.
*Ad serving performance updates.
Fixes for search and navigation functionality.
Ad-serving functionality improvements

* Share your favorites: Share recipes you love on Facebook, Twitter, Instapaper, Tumblr, and more.

* Bug fixes: User-reported issues with Epicurious.com profile log-in from the app have been addressed. 
 
* Recipe Box Sync enhancements: Now it's even easier to sync your favorite Epicurious.com recipes to your iPhone and iPad.

* Ad-serving functionality improvements: Intrusive advertising placements have been removed and problems with ad-serving functionality have been fixed. Please close and reopen the app to ensure your device is up to date after you upgrade.

* Recipe Box Sync: For a small one-time fee, sync your Favorites list in the Epicurious app with your online Recipe Box at Epicurious.com anytime.
 
* New Ways to Browse Recipes on the iPhone: Tap to display recipes in a list when browsing or searching, to make it easier to view dozens of recipes at a glance.
 
* New Recipe Navigation on the iPad: Tap directly through a list of recipes when browsing or searching on the iPad, without returning to the results screen

* Fast-app switching
Includes bug fixes.

This update includes
* improved stability
* interactive ads

· One integrated app that works on both iPhone and iPad, delivering an experience customized to whichever device you're currently using

· E-mail shopping lists to yourself, family, or friends

· Improved recipe browse

· Updated Favorites list
Special recipe collections for the holidays, plus bug fixes.
Includes bug fixes.
Includes bug fixes.

itunesNotes.standard: Prepare delicious meals and maximize your grocery trips with this beautifully designed cooking app. Epicurious hosts thousands of searchable recipes across a wide range of categories, and you can easily save them to an organized recipe box or generate handy shopping lists. The more we use Epicurious, the more we love its timely content, mouthwatering photos, helpful customer ratings, and overall presentation.

description.standard:
Experience the all-new Epicurious app with added free features and a fresh interface. The ever-popular cooking resource—over 10 million downloads—has been fully redesigned and reengineered for today’s home cooks.

·      A whole new look and completely reengineered—it's even faster, friendlier, and more fun to search.

·      Recipe Box sync is now FREE: all your recipes—from anywhere on the Web—saved and searchable in one place.

·      Manage all your recipes and shopping lists from anywhere on your iPhone, iPad, and desktop.

·      No more smudge-y screens: Voice-activated commands in the Cook Mode let you follow recipes while keeping your hands free for cooking (available only on iPad).

·      New fonts and bigger pictures make cooking from iPhone or iPad even easier.

·      Search more than 30,000 editorially tested and member-rated recipes.

·      Get inspired browsing new categories like Chocolate Desserts, Kid-Friendly Mains, Gluten-Free, Stir-Fry Suppers, Low-Carb Mains, Healthy Dinners, and Hearty Sandwiches.

·      The only app resource for recipes from the editors of Epicurious and Gourmet magazine, plus recipes from Bon Appétit, Self, Random House, and more.

·      Read comments and suggestions by other home cooks like you on tens of thousands of recipes.

·      Thousands of mouth-watering images by today’s top food photographers.

The new Epicurious app for iPhone and iPad requires IOS 7.

Contact us at apphelp@epicurious.com with any feedback and questions.

softwareInfo.requirementsString: Requires iOS 7.0 or later. Compatible with iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch. This app is optimized for iPhone 5.
